General.Name: Shanxi C&Y Pharmaceutical Group Co Ltd
General.Description: ShanXi C&Y Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of pharmaceutical products in China, the United States, Hong Kong, and internationally. It offers products for pregnant women and babies; urinary system products; anti-infection products; traditional Chinese medicines; and dermatology products, as well as tea bags. The company was formerly known as Shanxi C&Y Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shanxi C&Y Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd. in September 2014. Shanxi C&Y Pharmaceutical Group Co., LTD. was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
